name: Go2Joy
tagline: No.1 real-time hotel reservation service for Vietnamese youth. Go2Joy provides the most 1-2 star hotel DB in Vietnam.
description:
Go2Joy is an application that allows you to easily search for accommodations around you using location information and make quick reservations, providing the largest database of 1-2 star hotels in Vietnam.
In addition, we are operating a service for 2030 households by introducing the hourly/half-day accommodation reservation function for the first time in Vietnam.
